name: src/api/trajserv/typedefs.js
content:
/**
 * @typedef {Object} OperatingInformations
 * @property {string} operatingPeriod
 * @property {string} notOperatingDays
 * @property {string} additionalOperatingDays
 *
 */

/**
 * @typedef {Object} Trajectory
 * @property {string} id
 * @property {string} type
 * @property {string} name
 * @property {string} color
 * @property {string} textColor
 * @property {string} delay
 * @property {string} operator
 * @property {string} journeyIdentifier
 * @property {string} routeIdentifier
 * @property {string} timeIntervals
 * @property {ol/geom/LineString~LineString} geometry  A LineString in [EPSG:4326](http://epsg.io/4326).
 * @property {string} cancelled
 */

/**
 * @typedef {Object} TrajStation
 * @property {string} id
 * @property {string} destination
 * @property {string} backgroundColor
 * @property {string} color
 * @property {string} vehicleType
 * @property {string} routeIdentifier
 * @property {string} longName
 * @property {string} shortName
 * @property {string} stations
 * @property {string} wheelchairAccessible
 * @property {string} bicyclesAllowed
 * @property {string} realTime
 * @property {string} feedsId
 * @property {OperatingInformations} operatingInformations
 * @property {string} operator
 * @property {string} operatorUrl
 * @property {string} operatorTimeZone
 */

name: src/common/layers/Layer.js
Layer
description: A class representing a layer to display on map.

unknown.tagValue: {string} key - Identifier of the layer. Must be unique.
{boolean} isBaseLayer - Define if the layer is a base layer. Read-only.
{boolean} isQueryable - Define if the layer can be queried. Read-only.
{boolean} isReactSpatialLayer - Custom property for duck typing since `instanceof` is not working when the instance was created on different bundles. Read-only.
{boolean} visible - Define if the layer is visible or not.
{ol/Map~Map|mapboxgl.Map} map - The map where the layer is displayed.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

params.name: options.name
params.description: Layer name. Default use a generated uuid.

params.name: options.key
params.description: Layer key, will use options.name.toLowerCase() if not specified.

params.name: options.visible
params.description: If true this layer is visible on the map.

params.name: options.isBaseLayer
params.description: If true this layer is a baseLayer.

params.name: options.isQueryable
params.description: If true feature information can be queried by the react-spatial LayerService. Default is undefined, but resulting to true if not strictly set to false.

name: defineProperties
description: Define layer's properties.

name: init
description: Initialize the layer with the map passed in parameters.

name: terminate
description: Terminate what was initialized in init function. Remove layer, events...

name: get
description: Get a layer property.

name: set
description: Set a layer property.

name: setVisible
description: Change the visibility of the layer

params.name: visible
params.description: Defines the visibility of the layer

name: getVisibleChildren
description: Returns an array with visible child layers

name: hasVisibleChildren
description: Checks whether the layer has child layers with visible set to True

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} True if the layer has visible child layers

return.description: True if the layer has visible child layers

name: hasChildren
description: Checks whether the layer has any child layers with visible equal to the input parameter

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} True if the layer has children with the given visibility

params.name: visible
params.description: The state to check the childlayers against

return.description: True if the layer has children with the given visibility

name: addChild
description: Add a child layer

name: removeChild
description: Removes a child layer by layer name

description: Request feature information for a given coordinate.

unknown.tagValue:
{Promise<{layer:Layer, features:Object[], coordinate:number[]}>} Promise with features, layer and coordinate
 or null if no feature was hit.

params.name: coordinate
params.description: Coordinate to request the information at.

return.description:
Promise with features, layer and coordinate
 or null if no feature was hit.

description: Listens to click events on the layer.

params.name: callback
params.description:
Callback function, called with the clicked
  features,

name: unClick
description: Unlistens to click events on the layer.

params.name: callback
params.description:
Callback function, called with the clicked
  features,
  the layer instance and the click event.

name: src/setupTests.js

content:
# mobility-toolbox-js

Toolbox for JavaScript applications in the domains of mobility and logistics.
The tools in this library have been inspired by many projects realized for public transport agencies, mobility providers and logistics companies.

![Node CI](https://github.com/geops/mobility-toolbox-js/workflows/Node%20CI/badge.svg)
[![Netlify Status](https://api.netlify.com/api/v1/badges/b368ab18-9dbf-416c-91f6-a82076b02c10/deploy-status)](https://app.netlify.com/sites/mobility-toolbox-js/deploys)

## Main Features
* Display [real-time vehicle positions and prognosis data](http://tracker.geops.ch/) on a map.
* Search for [stops and stations](https://maps2.trafimage.ch) all over the world.
* Get [precise geographic courses](https://geops.github.io/geops-routing-demo/) for all modes of transport.
* Generate beautiful maps for public transport, mobility and logistics

## Getting started
Install running `yarn add mobility-toolbox-js`.

Check our examples and the API Documentation.
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "mobility-toolbox-js",
  "license": "MIT",
  "version": "1.0.0-beta.6",
  "main": "build/index.js",
  "module": "src/index.js",
  "files": [
    "build",
    "src/index.js",
    "src/api",
    "src/ol",
    "src/mapbox",
    "src/search",
    "src/common"
  ],
  "dependencies": {
    "@material-ui/core": "^4.9.14",
    "@material-ui/icons": "^4.9.1",
    "@material-ui/styles": "^4.9.14",
    "codesandbox": "^2.1.14",
    "es6-mixin": "^0.3.0",
    "lodash": "^4.17.15",
    "mapbox-gl": "^1.10.1",
    "ol": "^6.3.1",
    "prop-types": "^15.7.2",
    "query-string": "^6.13.0",
    "react": "^16.13.1",
    "react-app-polyfill": "^1.0.6",
    "react-dom": "^16.13.1",
    "react-markdown": "^4.3.1",
    "react-router": "^5.2.0",
    "react-router-dom": "^5.2.0",
    "react-syntax-highlighter": "^12.2.1",
    "taffydb": "^2.7.3",
    "typeface-lato": "^0.0.75",
    "uuid": "^8.1.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/plugin-transform-runtime": "^7.10.1",
    "@neutrinojs/airbnb": "^9.1.0",
    "@neutrinojs/airbnb-base": "^9.1.0",
    "@neutrinojs/copy": "^9.1.0",
    "@neutrinojs/image-loader": "^9.1.0",
    "@neutrinojs/jest": "^9.1.0",
    "@neutrinojs/library": "^9.1.0",
    "@neutrinojs/react": "^9.1.0",
    "cypress": "^4.8.0",
    "deepmerge": "^4.2.2",
    "documentation": "^13.0.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-publish-html-plugin": "^1.1.2",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^7.1.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb": "^18.0.1",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^6.5.0",
    "eslint-plugin-cypress": "^2.11.1",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.18.2",
    "eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y": "^6.2.3",
    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^3.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.14.3",
    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^4.0.4",
    "fixpack": "^3.0.0",
    "husky": "^4.0.0",
    "jest": "^25",
    "jest-canvas-mock": "^2.2.0",
    "jest-fetch-mock": "^3.0.3",
    "jest-serializer-html": "^7.0.0",
    "jsdoc": "^3.6.4",
    "lint-staged": "^10.2.9",
    "neutrino": "^9.1.0",
    "node-sass": "^4.14.1",
    "path": "^0.12.7",
    "postcss-loader": "^3.0.0",
    "prettier": "^2.0.5",
    "sass-loader": "^8.0.2",
    "sort-json": "^2.0.0",
    "start-server-and-test": "^1.11.0",
    "stylelint": "^13.6.0",
    "stylelint-config-recommended-scss": "^4.0.0",
    "stylelint-config-standard": "^20.0.0",
    "stylelint-scss": "^3.12.1",
    "webpack": "^4.43.0",
    "webpack-cli": "^3.3.11",
    "webpack-dev-server": "^3.11.0"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "apidoc": "esdoc",
    "build": "yarn lib",
    "coverage": "yarn test  --watchAll=false  --coverage --coverageDirectory=coverage",
    "cy:open": "cypress open",
    "cy:run": "cypress run",
    "cy:test": "start-server-and-test start http://localhost:5000 'cypress run'",
    "doc": "yarn apidoc && cp apidoc/index.json src/doc/components/Esdoc/ && webpack --mode production",
    "doc:dev": "yarn apidoc && webpack --mode development",
    "format": "prettier --write 'src/**/*.js' && eslint 'src/**/*.js' --fix && stylelint 'src/**/*.css' 'src/**/*.scss' --fix",
    "lib": "REACT_APP_LIB_MODE=1  webpack --mode production",
    "lib:dev": "REACT_APP_LIB_MODE=1  webpack --mode development",
    "lint": "eslint 'src/**/*.js' && stylelint 'src/**/*.css' 'src/**/*.scss'",
    "publish:beta": "yarn publish:public --tag beta",
    "publish:public": "yarn version && git push origin HEAD && yarn build && yarn publish",
    "start": "yarn doc && webpack-dev-server --mode development --open",
    "test": "REACT_APP_LIB_MODE=1 jest --env=jsdom --transformIgnorePatterns \"/node_modules/(?!(ol)/).*/\"",
    "test:watch": "yarn test --watchAll"
  },
  "browserslist": {
    "production": [
      ">0.2%",
      "not dead",
      "not op_mini all"
    ],
    "development": [
      "last 1 chrome version",
      "last 1 firefox version",
      "last 1 safari version",
      "last 1 ie version"
    ]
  },
  "eslintConfig": {
    "env": {
      "cypress/globals": true,
      "node": true,
      "browser": true,
      "es6": true,
      "jest": true
    },
    "parser": "babel-eslint",
    "extends": [
      "airbnb",
      "airbnb/hooks",
      "prettier",
      "prettier/react"
    ],
    "plugins": [
      "cypress",
      "prettier"
    ],
    "rules": {
      "react/jsx-filename-extension": [
        1,
        {
          "extensions": [
            ".js",
            ".jsx"
          ]
        }
      ],
      "prettier/prettier": "error"
    },
    "settings": {
      "react": {
        "version": "detect"
      }
    }
  },
  "husky": {
    "hooks": {
      "post-checkout": "yarn install --frozen-lockfile",
      "post-merge": "yarn install --frozen-lockfile",
      "post-rebase": "yarn install --frozen-lockfile",
      "pre-commit": "CI=true lint-staged   "
    }
  },
  "lint-staged": {
    "(src|__mocks__)/**/*.js": [
      "eslint --fix",
      "prettier --write",
      "git add",
      "yarn test --bail --findRelatedTests"
    ],
    "package.json": [
      "fixpack --sortToTop name --sortToTop license --sortToTop description --sortToTop version --sortToTop author --sortToTop main --sortToTop module --sortToTop files --sortToTop proxy --sortToTop dependencies --sortToTop peerDependencies --sortToTop devDependencies --sortToTop resolutions --sortToTop scripts"
    ],
    "src/**/*.{css,scss}": [
      "stylelint --fix"
    ]
  },
  "prettier": {
    "trailingComma": "all",
    "singleQuote": true
  },
  "stylelint": {
    "plugins": [
      "stylelint-scss"
    ],
    "extends": [
      "stylelint-config-standard",
      "stylelint-config-recommended-scss"
    ]
  }
}

description: Activate/deactivate pointer hover effect.

name: style
description: Style of the vehicle.

name: filter
description: Time speed.

name: sort
description: Set the filter for tracker features.
